data.comment: The match has started, with Bournemouth kicking-off.
Goal! Philip Billing gives Bournemouth a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 12, That's a fine assist from Adam Smith.
Barnsley's Cauley Woodrow has been booked in Barnsley.
The first-half is over.
Goal! Bournemouth extend their lead to 0-2 through Dominic Solanke.
In the minute 45, Lewis Cook with an assist there.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Barnsley kick-off.
In the minute 52, Great finish from Diego Rico Salguero to give Bournemouth a 0-3 lead.
Barnsley make their first substitution with Dominik Frieser replacing Conor Chaplin.
The home team have replaced Victor Adeboyejo with Clarke Oduor. This is the second substitution made today by Valerien Ismael.
In the minute 58, Luke Thomas is replacing Callum Styles for Barnsley at Oakwell Ground.
Valerien Ismael (Barnsley) is making a fourth substitution, with Aapo Halme replacing Michal Helik.
Goal! Bournemouth extend their lead to 0-4 through Sam Surridge.
In the minute 72, Jason Tindall is making the team's first substitution at Oakwell Ground with Dan Gosling replacing David Brooks.
The away team have replaced Dominic Solanke with Jaidon Anthony. This is the second substitution made today by Jason Tindall.
Mads Andersen (Barnsley) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 81, Rodrigo Riquelme is on a sub for Lewis Cook for Bournemouth.
Romal Palmer is replacing Herbie Kane for the home team.
Michael Sollbauer (Barnsley) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The match has come to a close in Barnsley. The final score is 0-4.
Gavin Kilkenny is replacing Adam Smith for Bournemouth at Oakwell Ground.
The away team replace Philip Billing with Nnamdi Ofoborh.
